item1.FIELD3: Beer battered dory fish, deep fried to crisp and served with potato fries. Accompanied with tartar, ketchup and our very own Pinakurat

item2.FIELD3: Skewer of marinated chicken cubes and vegetables, grilled and glazed with special barbecue sauce

item3.FIELD3: Baguio Craft Brewery's grilled fall off-the bone ribs, basted with Zigzagger beer BBQ sauce, accompanied with Cajun spiced shrimp, juicy corn on the cob & crispy fries

item4.FIELD3: Our very version of Isaw, marinated with stout beer, grilled and topped with corn salsa

item5.FIELD3: Half pack ribs basted with Zigzagger beer BBQ sauce, served with juicy corn on the cob and crispy fries

item6.FIELD3: A platter of premium sausages (Hungarian, Schublig, Kielbasa), Bruschetta, caramelized onion, cheese and grainy mustard

item7.FIELD3: Ground beef patty stuffed with jalapeno and bleu cheese. Served with crispy fries

item8.FIELD3: Served on a bed of toasted English muffin, topped with diced green apples & sour cream sauce, a side of cabbage & apple slaw, and crispy fries

item9.FIELD3: Beer marinated chicken thighs, grilled and served with roasted vegetables and rice

item10.FIELD3: Home smoked pork belly, deep fried and glazed with our special barbecue sauce. Served with rice and grilled vegetable

item11.FIELD3: Nacho chips overloaded with beef, cheese and vegetables. Served with our in-house garlic sauce and salsa

item12.FIELD3: Homemade tortillas filled with grilled chicken and fresh vegetables

item13.FIELD3: Classic chicken wings, deep fried to perfection coated with our special spicy buffalo sauce. Served with housemade bleu cheese dip and vegetable sticks

item14.FIELD2: Salt and Pepper Wings with Chips
item14.FIELD3: A less spicy alternative to our buffalo wings, chicken wings deep fried, seasoned with sea salt and cracked black pepper.

item15.FIELD3: A trio of soft tortilla with grilled spiced dory fish on a bed of fresh sliced lettuce topped with fresh chopped tomato, onion and cilantro. Best served with our housemade salsa

item16.FIELD3: Spiced pulled pork on a bed of soft tortilla shell topped with fresh vegetables

item17.FIELD3: Deep fried pork ruffles, spiced and served with Pinakurat.

item18.FIELD3: Chicken skin marinated with throat-cutter beer deep-fried to crisp and seasoned well. Served with Pinakurat dressing
